title: Pulumi Package Metaschema
description: A description of the schema for a Pulumi Package

name.description: The unqualified name of the package (e.g. "aws", "azure", "gcp", "kubernetes", "random")

displayName.description: The human-friendly name of the package.

version.description: The version of the package. The version must be valid semver.

description.description: The description of the package. Descriptions are interpreted as Markdown.

keywords.description: The list of keywords that are associated with the package, if any.

license.description: The name of the license used for the package's contents.

attribution.description: Freeform text attribution of derived work, if required.

repository.description: The URL at which the package's sources can be found.

logoUrl.description: The URL of the package's logo, if any.

pluginDownloadURL.description: The URL to use when downloading the provider plugin binary.

publisher.description: The name of the person or organization that authored and published the package.

moduleFormat.description: A regex that is used by the importer to extract a module name from the module portion of a type token. Packages that use the module format "namespace1/namespace2/.../namespaceN" do not need to specify a format. The regex must define one capturing group that contains the module name, which must be formatted as "namespace1/namespace2/...namespaceN".

supportPack.description: Write the package to support the pack command.

variables.description: A map from variable name to propertySpec that describes a package's configuration variables.

defaults.description: A list of the names of the package's non-required configuration variables.

types.description: A map from type token to complexTypeSpec that describes the set of complex types (i.e. object, enum) defined by this package.

provider.description: The provider type for this package.

resources.description: A map from type token to resourceSpec that describes the set of resources and components defined by this package.

functions.description: A map from token to functionSpec that describes the set of functions defined by this package.

language.description: Additional language-specific data about the package.

parameterization.description: An optional object to define parameterization for the package.

name.description: The unqualified name of the package (e.g. "aws", "azure", "gcp", "kubernetes", "random")

version.description: The version of the package. The version must be valid semver.

pluginDownloadURL.description: The URL to use when downloading the provider plugin binary.

allowedPackageNames.description: A list of allowed package names in addition to the name property.

language.description: Additional language-specific data about the package.

token.title: Token
token.$comment: In the regex below, the 'module' portion of the token is optional. However, a missing module component creates a '::', which breaks URNs ('::' is the URN delimiter). We have many test schemas that use an empty module component successfully, as they never create URNs; while these are _probably_ the only places that need updating, it might be possible that there are module-less type tokens in the wild elsewhere and we may need to remain compatible with those tokens.

typeSpec.title: Type Reference
typeSpec.description: A reference to a type. The particular kind of type referenced is determined based on the contents of the "type" property and the presence or absence of the "additionalProperties", "items", "oneOf", and "$ref" properties.

plain.description: Indicates that when used as an input, this type does not accept eventual values.

oneOf.title: Primitive Type
oneOf.description: A reference to a primitive type. A primitive type must have only the "type" property set.

oneOf.title: Array Type
oneOf.description: A reference to an array type. The "type" property must be set to "array" and the "items" property must be present. No other properties may be present.
oneOf.$comment: An array type must have the "type" property set.

items.description: The element type of the array

oneOf.title: Map Type
oneOf.description: A reference to a map type. The "type" property must be set to "object" and the "additionalProperties" property may be present. No other properties may be present.

additionalProperties.description: The element type of the map. Defaults to "string" when omitted.

oneOf.title: Named Type
oneOf.description: A reference to a type in this or another document. The "$ref" property must be present. The "type" property is ignored if it is present. No other properties may be present.

type.description: ignored; present for compatibility with existing schemas

$ref.description:
The URI of the referenced type. For example, the built-in Archive, Asset, and Any
types are referenced as "pulumi.json#/Archive", "pulumi.json#/Asset", and "pulumi.json#/Any", respectively.
A type from this document is referenced as "#/types/pulumi:type:token".
A type from another document is referenced as "path#/types/pulumi:type:token", where path is of the form:
  "/provider/vX.Y.Z/schema.json" or "pulumi.json" or "http[s]://example.com/provider/vX.Y.Z/schema.json"
A resource from this document is referenced as "#/resources/pulumi:type:token".
A resource from another document is referenced as "path#/resources/pulumi:type:token", where path is of the form:
  "/provider/vX.Y.Z/schema.json" or "pulumi.json" or "http[s]://example.com/provider/vX.Y.Z/schema.json"

oneOf.title: Union Type
oneOf.description: A reference to a union type. The "oneOf" property must be present. The union may additional specify an underlying primitive type via the "type" property and a discriminator via the "discriminator" property. No other properties may be present.

type.description: The underlying primitive type of the union, if any

oneOf.description: If present, indicates that values of the type may be one of any of the listed types

discriminator.description: Informs the consumer of an alternative schema based on the value associated with it

propertyName.description: PropertyName is the name of the property in the payload that will hold the discriminator value

mapping.description: An optional object to hold mappings between payload values and schema names or references

propertySpec.title: Property Definition
propertySpec.description: Describes an object or resource property

description.description: The description of the property, if any. Interpreted as Markdown.

const.description: The constant value for the property, if any. The type of the value must be assignable to the type of the property.

default.description: The default value for the property, if any. The type of the value must be assignable to the type of the property.

defaultInfo.description: Additional information about the property's default value, if any.

environment.description: A set of environment variables to probe for a default value.

language.description: Additional language-specific data about the default value.

deprecationMessage.description: Indicates whether the property is deprecated

language.description: Additional language-specific data about the property.

secret.description: Specifies whether the property is secret (default false).

replaceOnChanges.description: Specifies whether a change to the property causes its containing resource to be replaced instead of updated (default false).

willReplaceOnChanges.description: Indicates that the provider will replace the resource when this property is changed.

complexTypeSpec.title: Type Definition
complexTypeSpec.description: Describes an object or enum type.

description.description: The description of the type, if any. Interpreted as Markdown.

language.description: Additional language-specific data about the type.

isOverlay.description: Indicates that the implementation of the type should not be generated from the schema, and is instead provided out-of-band by the package author

description.description: The description of the type, if any

properties.description: A map from property name to propertySpec that describes the object's properties.

type.description: The type of the object.  Must be 'object' if this is an object type, or the underlying type for an enum.

required.description: A list of the names of an object type's required properties. These properties must be set for inputs and will always be set for outputs.

language.description: Additional language-specific data about the object type.

isOverlay.description: indicates whether the type is an overlay provided by the package. Overlay code is generated by the package rather than using the core Pulumi codegen libraries.

overlaySupportedLanguages.description: A list of languages that the overlay supports. This only has an effect if the Resource is an Overlay (isOverlay == true).  Supported values are 'nodejs', 'python', 'go', 'csharp', 'java', 'yaml'.

type.description: The underlying primitive type of the enum

enum.description: The list of possible values for the enum

name.description: If present, overrides the name of the enum value that would usually be derived from the value.

description.description: The description of the enum value, if any. Interpreted as Markdown.

deprecationMessage.description: Indicates whether the value is deprecated.

description.description: The description of the resource, if any. Interpreted as Markdown.

inputProperties.description: A map from property name to propertySpec that describes the resource's input properties.

requiredInputs.description: A list of the names of the resource's required input properties.

stateInputs.description: An optional objectTypeSpec that describes additional inputs that may be necessary to get an existing resource. If this is unset, only an ID is necessary.

aliases.description: The list of aliases for the resource.

name.description: The name portion of the alias, if any

project.description: The project portion of the alias, if any

type.description: The type portion of the alias, if any

deprecationMessage.description: Indicates whether the resource is deprecated

isComponent.description: Indicates whether the resource is a component.

methods.description: A map from method name to function token that describes the resource's method set.

isOverlay.description: Indicates that the implementation of the resource should not be generated from the schema, and is instead provided out-of-band by the package author

description.description: The description of the function, if any. Interpreted as Markdown.

inputs.description: The bag of input values for the function, if any.

multiArgumentInputs.description: A list of parameter names that determines whether the input bag should be treated as a single argument or as multiple arguments. The list corresponds to the order in which the parameters should be passed to the function.

outputs.description: Specifies the return type of the function definition.

returnType.description: Specifies the return type of the function definition.

deprecationMessage.description: Indicates whether the function is deprecated

language.description: Additional language-specific data about the function.

isOverlay.description: Indicates that the implementation of the function should not be generated from the schema, and is instead provided out-of-band by the package author

overlaySupportedLanguages.description: A list of languages that the overlay supports. This only has an effect if the Resource is an Overlay (isOverlay == true).  Supported values are 'nodejs', 'python', 'go', 'csharp', 'java', 'yaml'.

rootNamespace.desciption: Root namespace for the generated .NET SDK

respectSchemaVersion.description: Respect the Pkg.Version field for emitted code.

importBasePath.description: Base import path for the Go package

respectSchemaVersion.description: Respect the Pkg.Version field for emitted code.

readme.description: Content of the generated package README.md file.

respectSchemaVersion.description: Respect the Pkg.Version field for emitted code.

readme.description: Content of the generated package README.md file.

requires.description: Python package dependencies for the generated Python SDK

respectSchemaVersion.description: Respect the Pkg.Version field for emitted code.

basePackage.description: Base Java package name for the generated Java provider SDK

buildFiles.description: If set to "gradle" enables a generation of a basic set of Gradle build files.

dependencies.description: Specifies Maven-style dependencies for the generated code.

gradleNexusPublishPluginVersion.description: Enables the use of a given version of io.github.gradle-nexus.publish-plugin in the generated Gradle build files (only when `buildFiles="gradle")

gradleTest.description: generates a test section to enable `gradle test` command to run unit tests over the generated code. Supported values: "JUnitPlatform" (only when `buildFiles="gradle")
